trans-unit.resname: LEG·137 | Chain Lightning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.
trans-unit.target: 连锁闪电对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。然后该牌手或该永久物的操控者可以支付{R}{R}。如果该牌手如此作，则其可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap CARDNAME and it deals X damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，放一个+1/+1指示物在原生的流浆上，然后支付oX，此X等于其上该种指示物的数量；否则横置原生的流浆且它对你造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
trans-unit.target: 烟火术对任意数量的目标生物和／或牌手造成共4点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 每个玩家计算自己手上牌的数量，然后将这些牌放进他的牌库中洗牌。此后，抓取等数量的牌（当你使用转变之风时，它不算是你手上的牌）。

trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack a player unless that player cast a spell or put a nontoken permanent onto the battlefield during their last turn.

trans-unit.resname: LEG·295 | Serpent Generator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Snake artifact creature token. It has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：放置一毒蛇衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为1/1的神器生物。若任何毒蛇衍生物伤害任何玩家，则该玩家得一中毒指示物。若任何玩家得十个以上中毒指示物，则输掉此盘游戏。
